text:
You may be asked to provide your personal information anytime you are in contact with LMS Portals, LLC.
and its affiliates may share this personal information with each other and use it consistent with this Privacy Policy.

And so we have developed a Privacy Policy that addresses how we collect, use, disclose, transfer, and store your personal information [1] .
We will retain your personal information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy and our service specific privacy summaries.
